accessLevel.description: Access level for the MCP server, One of [ readonly, readwrite, admin ]

additionalTools.description: Comma-separated list of additional tools, One of [ helm, cilium ]

allowNamespaces.description: Comma-separated list of namespaces to allow access to. If not specified, all namespaces are allowed.

azureDir.description: Path to the Azure configuration directory (e.g. /home/azureuser/.azure). Used for Azure CLI authentication, you should be logged in (e.g. run `az login`) on the host before starting the MCP server.

containerUser.description: Username or UID of the container user (format <name|uid>[:<group|gid>] e.g. 10000), ensuring correct permissions to access the Azure and kubeconfig files. Leave empty to use default user in the container.

kubeconfig.description: Path to the kubeconfig file for the AKS cluster (e.g. /home/azureuser/.kube/config). Used to connect to the AKS cluster.

tools.description: Comma-separated list of tools to enable. Can be either a tool category, a specific tool, or an Apify Actor. For example: "actors,docs,apify/rag-web-browser". For more details visit https://mcp.apify.com.

storagePath.description: Directory path where downloaded papers will be stored

cbBucketName.description: Bucket in the Couchbase cluster to use for the MCP server.

cbConnectionString.description: Connection string for the Couchbase cluster.

cbMcpReadOnlyQueryMode.description: Setting to "true" (default) enables read-only query mode while running SQL++ queries.

cbUsername.description: Username for the Couchbase cluster with access to the bucket.

databaseUrl.description: Connection string for your database. Examples: SQLite: sqlite+aiosqlite:///data/mydb.db, PostgreSQL: postgresql+asyncpg://user:password@localhost:5432/mydb, MySQL: mysql+aiomysql://user:password@localhost:3306/mydb

paths.description: List of directories that Desktop Commander can access

url.description: api url - optional for self-hosted instances

gadgetImages.description: Comma-separated list of gadget images (trace_dns, trace_tcp, etc) to use, allowing control over which gadgets are available as MCP tools

kubeconfig.description: Path to the kubeconfig file for accessing Kubernetes clusters

userAgent.description: Custom user agent string (optional, helps avoid detection and cookie login issues)

concurrentLimit.description: Maximum concurrent requests to Okta API

pluggedinApiBaseUrl.description: Base URL for the Plugged.in API (optional, defaults to https://plugged.in for cloud or http://localhost:12005 for self-hosted)

prometheusUrl.description: The URL of your Prometheus server

replyTo.description: comma separated list of reply to email addresses

allowWrite.description: Enable read/write mode. If false, the app operates in read-only mode.

allowedDirectories.description: List of directories that rust-mcp-filesystem can access.

enableRoots.description: Enable dynamic directory access control via MCP client-side Roots.

generalInfoLevel.description: --info-level How much database metadata to retrieve

volumeHostShare.description: Host volume to map within the Docker container

org.description: Organization key for SonarQube Cloud, not required for SonarQube Server or Community Build

url.description: URL of the SonarQube instance, to provide only for SonarQube Server or Community Build

ueHost.description: Unreal Engine host address. Use: host.docker.internal for local UE on Windows/Mac Docker, 127.0.0.1 for Linux without Docker, or actual IP address (e.g., 192.168.1.100) for remote UE

kiteAccessToken.description: Access token obtained after OAuth authentication (optional - can be generated at runtime)

kiteApiKey.description: Your Kite Connect API key from the developer console

kiteRedirectUrl.description: OAuth redirect URL configured in your Kite Connect app
